title: Patiently Requesting Champion Skins
body:
I absolutely understand that this game is still within beta and all of the bugs and bumps are being ironed out, ... 

However, .. I really hope that skins are eventually going to make their way into TFT. 

But how?

My rational would be to have a skins category under the TFT tab in the client that lists all of the champions available in TFT. Here, you can select from the skins THAT YOU OWN FOR THAT CHAMPION , and that skin will appear for that champion when you summon them on your board, or when you travel to an enemy's board. 

The default skin will always appear on the champions in the carousel until you pick that champion up, or until it gets to your board. 

Again, I understand that something like this may be in the works for well down the road, .. but if not, .. please put it on the list.

replies.body:
The only issue I see is that it would be difficult for everyone to see what level your champions are.  Currently there's an easy bronze/silver/gold coloring that very recognizably shows the level, but unless you want three colorings of every single skin, I don't see that working.

Unless, perhaps, the skin would only show up when you upgrade it to level 3?  The tier 4/5 champs would never get there, but that would make it visually recognizable at least.

That is a very good point. However, I think the indicator in the health bar should be the go-to indicator, not the color of the champion. I actually don't even like that they change the color of the champion / armor based on rank.
they already made up some bs excuse saying they can't use league skins for tft cuz performance yadayadayada

I agree that skins would be awesome in this.  The only problem I see is that you have a limited time to overview everyone elses teams, and if they were all skinned, it would be very hard sometimes to figure out who everyone has in time.
There should be a function similar to tab in league that lets you see what everyone else is building anyways. Would solve that issue

They said that they will use skins as separate units in the future. Something like arclight vayne being noble with silver bolts and then a "project" origin units are added and one of them is project vayne with stealth-tumble.
They should get changed into one of their iconic skins when they're tier 2, and then their most famous or infamous skin in tier 3.

Skins would be great but being able to see all enemy champions in tab would be a life saver. We can still scan opponents one by one but we have only 30 sec between rounds so it would be cool. It would also let us use skins without confusing anyone so yeah - great ideas guys :)
